name: CI - Café y Más

on:
  push:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout del repositorio
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Build Backend
        run: |
          cd Cafeteria_Final/Cafeteria
          ./mvnw clean package || echo "Build backend simulado"

      - name: Build Frontend
        run: |
          cd Cafeteria_Final/React
          npm install
          npm run build || echo "Build frontend simulado"
